articles.title: Why are there NFL games on Saturday? How to watch Saturday's slate of games.
articles.description: We're at that part of the NFL season again. We now get football on Saturday as well as Sunday. Here's how to watch Saturday's games.
articles.content: The NFL season is nearing its end, which means we're at that time of year that has football fans giddier than a six-year-old on Christmas morning. There are NFL games on both Saturday and Sunday now!… [+3997 chars]

articles.title: 'Cancer' of attacks on officials 'will kill the game'
articles.description: Fifa referees chief Pierluigi Collina says referee attacks are a "cancer" which "will kill football" without action.
articles.content:
